body.name: Kenmore PM2010 Air Purifiers with H13 True HEPA Filter, Covers Up to 1200 Sq.Foot, 24db SilentClean 3-Stage HEPA Filtration System, 5 Speeds for Home Large Room, Kitchens & Bedroom
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 17 hrs 50 mins
FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 4 hrs 50 mins
features: POWERFUL ODOR REMOVAL: On average, more than 90% of modern life is spent indoors, effectively remove odors in your home caused by dander, smoke, cooking and pollutants
ENERGY STAR CERTIFIED: Proactively clean your environment without increasing your energy bill. The Kenmore Air Purifier equates to the same consumption level of one lightbulb
SILENT OPERATION: The unnoticeably quiet air purifier cleans the air without distractions, so you can watch TV, sleep and go on with your day knowing your air quality is being improved
3-STAGE FILTRATION: Noticeably reduce the amount of dust and pet dander in your room with the HEPA filter that captures 99.97% of airborne dust down to 0.3 microns
CLEAN AIR COVERAGE: Purify 1,200 square feet, based on one air change per hour. Perfect for living rooms, kitchens, bedrooms and more
DIGITAL DISPLAY: You are in control - set the mode, fan speed (5 speeds), create a timer and more with the easy-to-use interface
EASY FILTER MAINTENANCE: A digital filter meter on the body of the unit lets you know when it's time to replace the filter
body.description: The Kenmore 1200e Air Purifier cleans the air in your bedroom, kitchen and more with ease. Powerfully clean up to 1,200 square feet with super low energy consumption, based on one air change per hour. This ENERGYSTAR® certified product removes unwanted odors, dander, and more as the HEPA filter captures 99.97% of dust down to 0.3 microns. The SilentClean™ operation allows you to sleep soundly every night knowing your air quality is automatically being improved.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clean Air, Great Value
reviews.reviewText: Nice machine, HEPA filter, good looking, appears well made, great value. I have had this machine for about a month. Not loud on the settings I use (2 and 3) Sounds like a very quiet fan. (3 seems to do the best for me) I use it in a master bedroom + master bath, placed between the two. Definitely helping with dust.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quite and good value for your money
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I recently purchased the Kenmore Air Purifier, and I'm very pleased with its performance. One of the standout features of this air purifier is its quiet operation. Even when running at higher fan speeds, the noise level remains minimal, allowing for undisturbed sleep or work. The HEPA filter effectively captures and eliminates common airborne contaminants such as dust and pollen. This air purifier helps to reduce my symptoms of allergies a lot. Maintaining the ABC Air Purifier is hassle-free. The filter replacement process is straightforward and doesn't require any complex steps. Considering its affordable price point, this Air Purifier offers good value for money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It works great! We have it in our master bedroom and it’s very quiet. The fan speed transitions are really smooth and not as bothersome as another one we have. And we know it’s working because it turns up every time the cats use the litter box or we pull clothes off the rack. It’s also a nice small size. This is my favorite of the 3 different purifiers we own!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It is worth the price
reviews.reviewText: Pros:-Compact and sleek design. It only takes up a small space-Easy to operate-Auto mode helps with detecting the pollution levelCons:-It is not that quiet but bearable-The sleep mode is quiet but i am not sure if the machine adequately filters the pollution when I sleep-I expect more performance in odor elimination department.Overall, it is still a pretty good machine for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the Price
reviews.reviewText: This air purifier runs quietly and efficiently. I've noticed a big difference in air quality since over started using it. It does not have any automation though, so if you're wanting something to "set and forget" you're going to need an upgraded model.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quite, effective, efficient, great look. I would recommend it anytime !
reviews.reviewText: I have had this unit for only four days but I didn't want to wait longer to share my opinion. I have loved this air cleaner from the first minute I saw it. The LCD display is a great feature and shows fan speed, filter change and real time particulate matter 2.5 (PM2.5) which should be between 0 - 12.A too high amount of PM2.5 can contribute to respiratory issues, cardiovascular disease and cancer.I did challenge the air cleaner and smoked inside. The PM went up to 999 but it cleaned the air down to 12 in no more than one hour. On fan speed one you can hardly hear it running. It also has a timer to turn on or off. It would be nice if it came with a remote control though. I can't say anything negative about this air purifier. The filter last about 6 months but I can't confirm that yet. They cost 30.-

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best one ive had yet.
reviews.reviewText: I have been through a few of these over the years and they never work very well. Not the case with this guy, the auto mode is amazing and it effortllessly cleans the air in my house very fast. and sleep mode is super quiet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I never had one of these before, but I had a neighbor who smokes, and sometimes the smell would get in the house. My sister suggested this, and I am glad she did. Now the air stays crisp. When I first got the machine, my air quality was not terrible. It was in the teen digits. Now, it stays in the single digits (3-4). And, it has taught me that some food I cook are real pollutants. I did not realize. I cooked pork bacon, and the machine rose to triple digits. It was working overtime to clean the air back, but within 30-40min it was out of the red and back in good quality air. I may reconsider bacon going forward. That machine doesn't lie about air pollution. Even when I fried chicken it go to the 50s but never triple digits like the bacon. This machine covers about 1300sq ft.
